topic_or_construct: Food preference (desire to eat a food item)
justification: “In all trials of Studies 1 and 2, participants rated the food items … on a visual analogue scale (VAS) from 0 (not at all) to 100 (very much).”
“Study 3 assessed WTP … participants indicated their WTP on a slider scale from 0-3 Euro … by using a second price auction to actually implement one of their food choices.”

measured_by: Average ‘health star points’ in Howe’s Grocery online supermarket
justification: “To measure the healthiness of participants’ food choices in the supermarket task, we computed the average ‘health star points’ … of selected products in participants' basket.”
“Before and after the task, participants rated how hungry they felt (see Supplementary Table S1).”

measured_by: Beta weight of health regressor from multilevel GLM
justification: “This multi-level model yielded beta-weights for the taste and the health regressors for each participant, with larger beta-weights indicating greater importance of the regressor in predicting food preference ratings.”

measured_by: Beta weight of taste regressor from multilevel GLM
justification: Same multilevel GLM provided individual beta-weights for the taste regressor, indexing how much tastiness influenced each participant’s ratings.
